Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Canvey Island is a popular seaside resort located on the south coast of Essex, approximately 3 miles south east of South Benfleet and 10 miles west of Southend on Sea. 

The subject property is located in the main pitch of the high street in Canvey Island. The retail units are occupied by a range of independent retailers and national operators, such as Boots, Superdrug and Poundland.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The subject demise consists of ground floor, which is utilised as the main customer facing banking hall. 

There is also a first floor used as ancillary to the retail offering including staff welfare facilities.

Tenure
Leasehold

Rent
£36,500 per annum.

Terms
The premises are available by way of a sub-lease or assignment of the existing co-terminus leases expiring 18/07/2023.

A copy of the lease is available on request.

Rates
We are informed by the Local Rating Authority that the current Rateable Value of the property is £21,000. 

Interested parties should make their own enquiries in this regard.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: - BENFLEET RAILWAY STATION WITHIN CLOSE PROXIMITY

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Located in the neighbourhood district and London commuter town of Benfleet, Essex, 30 miles east of London. Rail services run from Benfleet Station, providing frequent direct trains to London Fenchurch Street.



Retailers within the immediate vicinity include Lloyds

Pharmacy, William Hill and Sainsbury's Local.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The premises are comprised over ground and first floor s.



Ground floor is currently being used as a banking hall with offices to the rear.



First floor primarily consists of staff ancillary.

Tenure
Freehold

Price
£250,000

Rates
We are informed by the Local Rating Authority that the current Rateable Value of the property is £13,250.



Interested parties should make their own enquiries in this regard.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
The subject premises are located on the north side of
Town Square, Basildon, which forms the primary high
street retail pitch. The unit is adjacent to Boots and
other nearby occupiers include Barclays, Savers, HSBC,
B&M and Bonmarche.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The premises are comprised of a ground floor retail
area with storage and ancillary areas to the rear. There
is direct access to the loading bay from the rear.

Tenure
Leasehold

Rent
On application.

Terms
The property is available by way of a new lease from the
Landlord for a term of 5 years, to be contracted outside the
security of tenure provisions of the Landlord & Tenant Act
1954.

Rates
We are informed by the Local Rating Authority that the
current Rateable Value of the property is £60,000.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
The subject property is located in a prominent position on Eastwood Road.
The property benefits from being nearby to a number of multiple retailers
including Marks & Spencer Simply Food, Superdrug and Dorothy Perkins.
A goad plan is on the reverse of these particulars.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property is arranged over ground and first floors and provides the
following approximate dimensions and floor areas:

Tenure
The premises are available by way of a new 10 year sublease. The
quoting rent is £150,000 per annum exclusive.

Terms
Incentives available subject to covenant status.

Rates
The rates are to be reassessed after the subdivision of the premises.
Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local
Authority for verification purposes.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Clacton-On-Sea is the largest seaside resort town on the Essex coast. The subject premises are located on Rosemary Road adjoining Barnardo’s with Wilkos and Savers closeby.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
A ground floor retail unit with ancillary. The unit provides the following approximate areas and dimensions:

Tenure
The premises are available by way of an assignment of the existing lease expiring 30 May 2029 and subject to a tenant only break option 29 May 2024 subject to prior written notice. Alternatively, the premises are available by way of a sub-lease for a term of years to be agreed.

Rent
£22,000 per annum exclusive.

EPC
Energy Efficiency rating is D.
Energy Performance Certificate available on request.

Rates
We understand from the VOA website that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £15,750 and the rates payable are £7,733.25 pa. The UBR for 2019/20 is 49.10p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes.

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: FRINTON ON SEA_ 95 97 CONNAUGHT AVENUE GOAD

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Frinton-on-Sea is a small coastal town in Essex, close to Colchester and Clacton-on-Sea.

The property is situated in a prime position on the main high street in the town, nearby national occupiers including Costa, Superdrug and Sainsbury’s Local.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The bank is arranged over ground, first and second floors. Ground floor consists of the banking hall, with office space on the upper floors.

Tenure
The property is held on an existing FRI lease due to expire 17/02/2026, with a break option on 17/02/2021.

Consideration
Offers accepted on the basis of assignment or sub-lease at the passing rent of £35,000 pa.

Rates
We understand from the VOA website that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £24,250 and the rates payable are £11,906 pa. The UBR for 2019/2020 is 49.1p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Halstead, a market town in Essex, is located 6 miles from Braintree, and 16 miles north of Chelmsford. The closest train station is Braintree, with direct trains to London Liverpool Street in just under an hour.
The subject premises is situated at the southern end of the High Street, nearby occupiers include Sainsbury’s, Boots and the Post Office.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property comprises a lock up shop on ground floor only.

Tenure
The premises are available by way of a new sublease.The quoting rent is £8,000 per annum exclusive.

Rent
The quoting rent is £8,000 per annum exclusive.

Rates
We are verbally informed by the Local Rating Authority that the current Rateable Value of the shop is £5,500.00 and the rates payable are £2,700.50 pa. The UBR for 2020/2021 is 49.10p. Interested parties are advised to make their own enquiries with the Local Authority for verification purposes
